content:
PR: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/90755

I originally made this as a guess to recover some compiler perf, which worked.

It also has an observable change for silly Clone impls, though, so I figured I'd mention it in case libs-api has feelings about that. By RFC#1521 it's explicitly allowed, and just means that arrays match vectors in this, so I think it's completely fine. But I figured I'd drop an FYI anyway.
